Name: One Escape
About the game: One day, three buddies decided to rob a bank. But something went wrong and the cops showed up... Now, these feisty felons need to smarten up and make the most incredible jailbreak. Find the way to freedom while hiding from the guards, searching for key cards to open the locked doors, and avoiding dangerous pitfalls! Complete 60 levels, and get out of prison at any cost! Features: * 60 levels to escape * Three characters with unique abilities * Challenging levels with puzzles and traps /
